trans-unit.source: Represents an individual item that is displayed within a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu" /> or <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenu" />.

Although <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem" /> replaces and adds functionality to the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem" /> control of previous versions, <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem" /> is retained for both backward compatibility and future use if you choose.
In order for a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem> to be displayed, you must add it to a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenu>.
trans-unit.target: 為了讓<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem>若要顯示，您必須新增至<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu>或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenu>。

trans-unit.source: To create submenus, you can add <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem> objects to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Menu.MenuItems%2A> property of the parent <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem>.
trans-unit.target: 若要建立子功能表，您可以加入<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem>物件加入至<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Menu.MenuItems%2A>屬性之父代<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem> class provides properties that enable you to configure the appearance and functionality of a menu item.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem>類別提供的內容，讓您設定的外觀和功能的功能表項目。

trans-unit.source: To display a check mark next to a menu item, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem.Checked%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要顯示功能表項目旁的核取記號，請使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem.Checked%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: You can use this feature to identify a menu item that is selected in a list of mutually exclusive menu items.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用這項功能，來識別在互斥的功能表項目清單中選取的功能表項目。

trans-unit.source: For example, if you have a set of menu items for setting the color of text in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> control, you can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem.Checked%2A> property to identify which color is currently selected.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果您有一組功能表項目來設定中的文字色彩的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>控制項，您可以使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem.Checked%2A>屬性來識別目前選取的色彩。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem.Shortcut%2A> property can be used to define a keyboard combination that can be pressed to select the menu item.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem.Shortcut%2A>屬性可以用來定義要選取功能表項目是可以按下鍵盤組合。

trans-unit.source: For <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem> objects displayed in a Multiple Document Interface (MDI) application, you can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem.MergeMenu%2A> method to merge the menus of an MDI parent for with that of its child forms to create a consolidated menu structure.
trans-unit.target: 如<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem>多重文件介面 (MDI) 應用程式中顯示的物件，您可以使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem.MergeMenu%2A>方法，將合併的 MDI 功能表的父代與它的子表單，以建立合併的功能表結構。

trans-unit.source: Because a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem> cannot be reused in multiple locations at the same time, such as in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu> and a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenu>, you can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem.CloneMenu%2A> method to create a copy of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem> for use in another location.
trans-unit.target: 因為<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem>無法重複使用多個位置中同時，例如在<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenu>，您可以使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem.CloneMenu%2A>方法來建立一份<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem>用於另一個位置。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem.Popup> event enables you to perform tasks before a menu is displayed.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem.Popup>事件可讓您執行工作，才能在顯示的功能表。

trans-unit.source: For example, you can create an event handler for this event to display or hide menu items based on the state of your code.
trans-unit.target: 例如，您可以建立此事件，以顯示或隱藏功能表項目，根據您的程式碼狀態的事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem.Select> event enables you to perform tasks such as providing detailed help for your application's menu items when the user places the mouse pointer over a menu item.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem.Select>事件可讓您執行工作，例如當使用者將滑鼠指標放在功能表項目時，應用程式的功能表項目提供詳細的說明。

trans-unit.source: The following code example creates a menu structure for a form.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會建立表單的功能表結構。

trans-unit.source: The example code adds a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem> to represent the top-level menu item, adds a submenu item to it for selecting a font size, and then adds two submenu items to that menu item that represent large and small font choices in an application.
trans-unit.target: 範例程式碼加入<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem>，表示最上層功能表項目中，選取字型的大小，將子功能表項目加入至它，然後將兩個子功能表項目加入至該功能表項目代表應用程式中的大型和小型的字型選項。

trans-unit.source: The example requires that there is a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu> object named `mainMenu1` and four <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem> objects named `menuItem1`, `menuItem2`, `menuItem3`, and `menuItem4`.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例需要有<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu>名為物件`mainMenu1`和第四個<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem>物件命名`menuItem1`， `menuItem2`， `menuItem3`，和`menuItem4`。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem" /> class.
Initializes a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem" /> with a blank caption.

Once you have created a blank <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem> using this constructor, you can use the properties and methods of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem> class to specify the appearance and behavior of your <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem>.
trans-unit.target: 一旦您建立空白<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem>使用這個建構函式，您可以使用的屬性和方法的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem>類別，以指定的外觀和行為您<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem>。

trans-unit.source: The following code example creates a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem> using this version of the constructor.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會建立<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem>使用這個版本的建構函式。

trans-unit.source: The caption for the menu item.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem" /> class with a specified caption for the menu item.
When you specify a caption for your menu item with the `text` parameter, you can also specify an access key by placing an '&' character before the character to be used as the access key.
trans-unit.target: 當您指定的標題與功能表項目的`text`參數，您也可以指定存取金鑰放入來作為存取金鑰字元之前 '&' 字元。

trans-unit.source: For example, to specify the "F" in "File" as an access key, you would specify the caption for the menu item as "&File".
trans-unit.target: 例如，若要指定 「 檔案 」 中的"F"做為存取金鑰，您會指定做為功能表項目的標題"& 檔案 」。

trans-unit.source: You can use this feature to provide keyboard navigation for your menus.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用這項功能可提供功能表的鍵盤巡覽。

trans-unit.source: Setting the `text` parameter to "`-`" causes your menu item to be displayed as a separator (a horizontal line) rather than a standard menu item.
trans-unit.target: 設定`text`參數 」`-`"會導致您的功能表項目顯示為分隔符號 （水平列），而不是標準功能表項目。

trans-unit.source: The following code example creates a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem> that specifies the caption of the menu item at the time it is constructed.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會建立<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem>在建構階段指定功能表項目的標題。

trans-unit.source: The caption for the menu item.
The <see cref="T:System.EventHandler" /> that handles the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem.Click" /> event for this menu item.
Initializes a new instance of the class with a specified caption and event handler for the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem.Click" /> event of the menu item.
When you specify a caption for your menu item with the `text` parameter, you can also specify an access key by placing an '&' before the character to be used as the access key.
trans-unit.target: 當您指定的標題與功能表項目的`text`參數，您也可以指定存取金鑰前放置一個 '&' 字元來作為存取金鑰。

trans-unit.source: For example, to specify the "F" in "File" as an access key, you would specify the caption for the menu item as "&File".
trans-unit.target: 例如，若要指定 「 檔案 」 中的"F"做為存取金鑰，您會指定做為功能表項目的標題"& 檔案 」。

trans-unit.source: You can use this feature to provide keyboard navigation for your menus.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用這項功能可提供功能表的鍵盤巡覽。

trans-unit.source: Setting the `text` parameter to "`-`" causes your menu item to be displayed as a separator (a horizontal line) rather than a standard menu item.
trans-unit.target: 設定`text`參數 」`-`"會導致您的功能表項目顯示為分隔符號 （水平列），而不是標準功能表項目。

trans-unit.source: In addition, you can use this constructor to specify a delegate that will handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem.Click> event for the menu item being created.
trans-unit.target: 此外，您可以使用這個建構函式來指定將處理委派<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem.Click>功能表項目所建立的事件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.EventHandler> that you pass to this constructor must be configured to call an event handler that can handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem.Click> event.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.EventHandler>必須設定您將傳遞給這個建構函式呼叫事件處理常式可以處理<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem.Click>事件。

trans-unit.source: For more information on handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example creates a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem> object with a specified caption and an <xref:System.EventHandler> delegate connected to an event handler that will handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem.Click> event for the menu item.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會建立<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem>物件與指定的標題和<xref:System.EventHandler>連線將處理之事件處理常式的委派<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem.Click>功能表項目的事件。

trans-unit.source: The caption for the menu item.
An array of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem" /> objects that contains the submenu items for this menu item.
Initializes a new instance of the class with a specified caption and an array of submenu items defined for the menu item.
When you specify a caption for your menu item with the `text` parameter, you can also specify an access key by placing an '&' before the character to be used as the access key.
trans-unit.target: 當您指定的標題與功能表項目的`text`參數，您也可以指定存取金鑰前放置一個 '&' 字元來作為存取金鑰。

trans-unit.source: For example, to specify the "F" in "File" as an access key, you would specify the caption for the menu item as "&File".
trans-unit.target: 例如，若要指定 「 檔案 」 中的"F"做為存取金鑰，您會指定做為功能表項目的標題"& 檔案 」。

trans-unit.source: You can use this feature to provide keyboard navigation for your menus.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用這項功能可提供功能表的鍵盤巡覽。

trans-unit.source: Setting the `text` parameter to "`-`" causes your menu item to be displayed as a separator (a horizontal line) rather than a standard menu item.
trans-unit.target: 設定`text`參數 」`-`"會導致您的功能表項目顯示為分隔符號 （水平列），而不是標準功能表項目。

trans-unit.source: The `items` parameter enables you to assign an array of menu items to define a submenu of this menu item.
trans-unit.target: `items`參數可讓您指派來定義這個功能表項目的子功能表的功能表項目的陣列。

trans-unit.source: Each item in the array can also have an array of menu items assigned to it.
trans-unit.target: 陣列中的每個項目也可以指派給它的功能表項目的陣列。

trans-unit.source: This enables you to create complete menu structures and assign them to the constructor for the menu item.
trans-unit.target: 這可讓您建立完整的功能表結構，並將它們指派給功能表項目的建構函式。

trans-unit.source: For more information on handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example creates an object with a specified caption, an event handler connected to a method that will handle the event each menu item in an array of submenu items.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例中建立物件與指定的標題，事件處理常式會處理事件的方法，來連接每個功能表項目的子功能表項目的陣列。

trans-unit.source: The caption for the menu item.
The <see cref="T:System.EventHandler" /> that handles the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem.Click" /> event for this menu item.
One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Shortcut" /> values.
Initializes a new instance of the class with a specified caption, event handler, and associated shortcut key for the menu item.
When you specify a caption for your menu item with the `text` parameter, you can also specify an access key by placing an '&' before the character to be used as the access key.
trans-unit.target: 當您指定的標題與功能表項目的`text`參數，您也可以指定存取金鑰前放置一個 '&' 字元來作為存取金鑰。

trans-unit.source: For example, to specify the "F" in "File" as an access key, you would specify the caption for the menu item as "&File".
trans-unit.target: 例如，若要指定 「 檔案 」 中的"F"做為存取金鑰，您會指定做為功能表項目的標題"& 檔案 」。

trans-unit.source: You can use this feature to provide keyboard navigation for your menus.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用這項功能可提供功能表的鍵盤巡覽。

trans-unit.source: This constructor also enables you to specify a shortcut key in addition to an access key to provide keyboard navigation.
trans-unit.target: 這個建構函式也可讓您指定除了便捷鍵，以提供鍵盤導覽的快速鍵。

trans-unit.source: Shortcut keys allow you to specify a combination of keys that can be used to activate the menu item.
trans-unit.target: 快速鍵可讓您指定的機碼，可用來啟用功能表項目組合。

trans-unit.source: Setting the `text` parameter to "`-`" causes your menu item to be displayed as a separator (a horizontal line) rather than a standard menu item.
trans-unit.target: 設定`text`參數 」`-`"會導致您的功能表項目顯示為分隔符號 （水平列），而不是標準功能表項目。

trans-unit.source: In addition, you can use this constructor to specify a delegate that will handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem.Click> event for the menu item being created.
trans-unit.target: 此外，您可以使用這個建構函式來指定將處理委派<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem.Click>功能表項目所建立的事件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.EventHandler> that you pass to this constructor must be configured to call an event handler that can handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem.Click> event.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.EventHandler>必須設定您將傳遞給這個建構函式呼叫事件處理常式可以處理<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem.Click>事件。

trans-unit.source: For more information on handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example creates an object with a specified caption, shortcut key, and an event handler connected to a method that will handle the event for the menu item.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會建立指定的標題、 攠摝坫與事件處理常式會處理功能表項目的事件的方法，來連接物件。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.MenuMerge" /> values.
The relative position that this menu item will take in a merged menu.
One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Shortcut" /> values.
The caption for the menu item.
The <see cref="T:System.EventHandler" /> that handles the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem.Click" /> event for this menu item.
The <see cref="T:System.EventHandler" /> that handles the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem.Popup" /> event for this menu item.
The <see cref="T:System.EventHandler" /> that handles the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem.Select" /> event for this menu item.
An array of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem" /> objects that contains the submenu items for this menu item.

Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem" /> class with a specified caption; defined event-handlers for the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem.Click" />, <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem.Select" /> and <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem.Popup" /> events; a shortcut key; a merge type; and order specified for the menu item.
When you specify a caption for your menu item with the `text` parameter, you can also specify an access key by placing an '&' before the character to be used as the access key.
trans-unit.target: 當您指定的標題與功能表項目的`text`參數，您也可以指定存取金鑰前放置一個 '&' 字元來作為存取金鑰。

trans-unit.source: For example, to specify the "F" in "File" as an access key, you would specify the caption for the menu item as "&File".
trans-unit.target: 例如，若要指定 「 檔案 」 中的"F"做為存取金鑰，您會指定做為功能表項目的標題"& 檔案 」。

trans-unit.source: You can use this feature to provide keyboard navigation for your menus.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用這項功能可提供功能表的鍵盤巡覽。

trans-unit.source: Setting the `text` parameter to "`-`" causes your menu item to be displayed as a separator (a horizontal line) rather than a standard menu item.
trans-unit.target: 設定`text`參數 」`-`"會導致您的功能表項目顯示為分隔符號 （水平列），而不是標準功能表項目。

trans-unit.source: The `items` parameter enables you to assign an array of menu items to define a submenu of this menu item.
trans-unit.target: `items`參數可讓您指派來定義這個功能表項目的子功能表的功能表項目的陣列。

trans-unit.source: Each item in the array can also have an array of menu items assigned to it.
trans-unit.target: 陣列中的每個項目也可以指派給它的功能表項目的陣列。

trans-unit.source: This enables you to create complete menu structures and assign them to the constructor for the menu item.
trans-unit.target: 這可讓您建立完整的功能表結構，並將它們指派給功能表項目的建構函式。

trans-unit.source: The `mergeType` and `mergeOrder` parameters allow you to determine how this menu item will behave when the menu item is merged with another menu.
trans-unit.target: `mergeType`和`mergeOrder`參數可讓您判斷此功能表項目與另一個功能表合併的功能表項目之後的行為。

trans-unit.source: Depending on the value you specify for the `mergeType` parameter, you can either add, remove, replace, or merge the menu item and its submenu items with the menu that it is merging with.
trans-unit.target: 您指定的值而定`mergeType`參數，您可以新增、 移除、 取代或合併的功能表項目及與它與合併的功能表及其子功能表項目。

trans-unit.source: The `mergeOrder` parameter determines where the menu item being created will be positioned when the menu is merged.
trans-unit.target: `mergeOrder`參數會決定功能表合併時其中放置所建立的功能表項目。

trans-unit.source: In addition, you can use this constructor to create a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem> and have it connected to an event handler in your code that will process the click of the menu item.
trans-unit.target: 此外，您可以使用這個建構函式來建立<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem>，並讓它連接至事件處理常式會處理功能表項目的按一下程式碼中。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.EventHandler> that you pass into this constructor should be configured to call an event handler that can handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem.Click> event.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.EventHandler>傳入此建構函式應該設定為呼叫事件處理常式可以處理<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem.Click>事件。

trans-unit.source: By using this constructor version, you can also connect the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem.Popup> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem.Select> events to determine when this menu item is selected.
trans-unit.target: 藉由使用這個建構函式版本，您也可以連接<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem.Popup>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem.Select>事件，以判斷當選取此功能表項目。

trans-unit.source: You can use these events for tasks such as determining whether or not to display a check mark next to submenu items or to enable or disable menu items based on the state of the application.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用這些事件的工作，例如決定顯示子功能表項目旁的核取記號，或要啟用或停用應用程式的狀態為基礎的功能表項目。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem.Select> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem.Click> events are raised only for <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem> objects that are not parent menu items.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem.Select>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem.Click>會引發事件，僅適用於<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem>的物件不父功能表項目。

trans-unit.source: For more information on handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example creates a menu item that has a caption and shortcut key.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會建立具有標題和快速鍵的索引鍵的功能表項目。

trans-unit.source: The menu item also has event handlers defined for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem.Popup>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem.Click>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem.Select> events.
trans-unit.target: 功能表項目也有定義的事件處理常式<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem.Popup>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem.Click>，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem.Select>事件。

trans-unit.source: If this menu item is merged, it will add the menu item to the menu with the merge order of zero.
trans-unit.target: 如果合併這個功能表項目，它會將功能表項目，加入具有零的合併式順序的功能表。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem" /> is placed on a new line (for a menu item added to a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu" /> object) or in a new column (for a submenu item or menu item displayed in a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenu" />).
<see langword="true" /> if the menu item is placed on a new line or in a new column; <see langword="false" /> if the menu item is left in its default placement.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 如果功能表項目會放置於新行上，或在新的資料行;<see langword="false" />如果功能表項目會留在其預設位置。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem.BarBreak%2A> property to create a menu where each menu item is placed next to each other horizontally instead of in a vertical list.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem.BarBreak%2A>建立每個功能表項目放置相鄰水平而不是以垂直清單功能表的屬性。

trans-unit.source: You can also use this property to create a menu bar that contains multiple rows of top-level menu items.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以使用這個屬性來建立功能表列，其中包含多個資料列的最上層功能表項目。

trans-unit.source: This property differs from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem.Break%2A> property in that a bar is displayed on the left edge of each menu item that has the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem.Break%2A> property set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性與不同<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem.Break%2A>具有屬性中的每個功能表項目左邊緣會顯示一個列<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem.Break%2A>屬性設定為`true`。

trans-unit.source: The bar is only displayed when the menu item is not a top-level menu item.
trans-unit.target: 功能表項目不是最上層功能表項目時，才會顯示的列。

trans-unit.source: The following code example creates a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem> with two submenu items.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會建立<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem>與兩個子功能表項目。

trans-unit.source: The two submenu items are displayed horizontally instead of vertically using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem.BarBreak%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 兩個子功能表項目會以水平方式顯示，而非使用垂直<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem.BarBreak%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the item is placed on a new line (for a menu item added to a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu" /> object) or in a new column (for a menu item or submenu item displayed in a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenu" />).
<see langword="true" /> if the menu item is placed on a new line or in a new column; <see langword="false" /> if the menu item is left in its default placement.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 如果功能表項目會放置於新行上，或在新的資料行;<see langword="false" />如果功能表項目會留在其預設位置。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem.Break%2A> property to create a menu where each menu is placed next to each other horizontally instead of in a vertical list.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem.Break%2A>建立每個功能表放置相鄰水平而不是以垂直清單功能表的屬性。

trans-unit.source: You can also use this property to create a menu bar that contains multiple rows of top-level menu items.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以使用這個屬性來建立功能表列，其中包含多個資料列的最上層功能表項目。

trans-unit.source: The following code example creates a menu with two top-level menu items on the top row and one menu item on the bottom row.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會建立功能表的上方資料列和一個功能表項目下方的資料列上的兩個最上層功能表項目。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether a check mark appears next to the text of the menu item.
<see langword="true" /> if there is a check mark next to the menu item; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 如果功能表項目; 旁邊的核取記號否則， <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem.Checked%2A> property in combination with other menu items in a menu to provide state for an application.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem.Checked%2A>提供狀態的應用程式功能表中的其他功能表項目與屬性組合。

trans-unit.source: For example, you can place a check mark on a menu item in a group of items to identify the size of the font to be displayed for the text in an application.
trans-unit.target: 例如，您可以將核取記號置於功能表項目群組中的項目來識別要顯示的應用程式中的文字字型的大小。

trans-unit.source: You can also use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem.Checked%2A> property to identify the selected menu item in a group of mutually exclusive menu items.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem.Checked%2A>屬性，以識別一組互斥的功能表項目中的選取的功能表項目。

trans-unit.source: This property cannot be set to `true` for top-level menu items.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性不能設定為`true`最上層功能表項目。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem.Checked%2A> property to provide the state in an application.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem.Checked%2A>屬性以提供應用程式中的狀態。

trans-unit.source: In this example, a group of menu items are used to specify the color for the text in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> control.
trans-unit.target: 在此範例中，一組功能表項目可用來指定文字的色彩<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The event handler provided is used by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem.Click> event of three menu items.
trans-unit.target: 提供的事件處理常式由<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem.Click>事件的三個功能表項目。

trans-unit.source: Each menu item specifies a text color, `menuItemRed` (Red), `menuItemGreen` (Green), or `menuItemBlue` (Blue).
trans-unit.target: 每個功能表項目指定文字的色彩， `menuItemRed` （紅色）， `menuItemGreen` （綠色），或`menuItemBlue`（藍色）。

trans-unit.source: The event handler determines which menu item was clicked, places a checkmark to the selected menu item, and changes the text color of the form's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> control.
trans-unit.target: 此事件處理常式決定哪一個功能表項目已按下、 放置一個核取記號來選取的功能表項目和變更表單的文字色彩<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The example requires that the <xref:System.Drawing> namespace has been added to the form that this code is placed in.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例需要<xref:System.Drawing>已加入此程式碼置於表單的命名空間。

trans-unit.source: The example also requires that a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> has been added to the form that this example code is located in that is named `textBox1`.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例也需要<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>已新增至表單，此程式碼範例位於名為`textBox1`。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem" /> is a top-level menu or has children.
Occurs when the menu item is clicked or selected using a shortcut key or access key defined for the menu item.
The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem.Click> event occurs when this <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem> is clicked by the user.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem.Click>就會發生事件時這<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem>使用者按下。

trans-unit.source: This event also occurs if the user selects the menu item using the keyboard and presses the Enter key.
trans-unit.target: 此事件也會發生，如果使用者選取功能表項目，使用鍵盤，並按下 Enter 鍵。

trans-unit.source: It can also occur if an access key or shortcut key is pressed that is associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem>.
trans-unit.target: 它也會發生的存取金鑰或攠摝坫按下時相關聯<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem>。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f)。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Menu.MenuItems%2A> property for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem> contains any items, this event is not raised.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Menu.MenuItems%2A>屬性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem>包含任何項目，就不會引發這個事件。

trans-unit.source: This event is not raised for parent menu items.
trans-unit.target: 父功能表項目不會引發這個事件。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem.Click> event to perform tasks when a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem> is clicked.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem.Click>事件以執行工作時<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem>按下。

trans-unit.source: The example creates a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu> called `mainMenu1` and adds two <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem> objects, `topMenuItem` (`File`) and `menuItem1` (`Open`).
trans-unit.target: 此範例會建立<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu>呼叫`mainMenu1`及加入兩個<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem>物件`topMenuItem`(`File`) 和`menuItem1`(`Open`)。

trans-unit.source: It then connects the `Click` event to the `menuItem1_Click` event handler.
trans-unit.target: 然後連接`Click`事件`menuItem1_Click`事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: When the user clicks the `Open` menu item, an <xref:System.Windows.Forms.OpenFileDialog> is initialized and displayed.
trans-unit.target: 當使用者按一下`Open`功能表項目，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.OpenFileDialog>初始化，且會顯示。

trans-unit.source: The example requires that you have created a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> named `Form1`.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例需要您已建立<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>名為`Form1`。

trans-unit.source: Creates a copy of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem" />.
Creates a copy of the current <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem" />.
A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem" /> that represents the duplicated menu item.
<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem> objects cannot be used in more than one place unless you obtain a copy of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem> 物件無法使用多個位置中，除非您取得一份<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem>。

trans-unit.source: You can call this method to create a copy of this menu item for use in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenu>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu>, or other <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem> within your application.
trans-unit.target: 您可以呼叫此方法以建立一份此功能表項目，以用於<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenu>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu>，或其他<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem>應用程式中。

trans-unit.source: When a menu item is cloned, any event handlers specified in the original menu item will continue to function in the cloned version of the menu item.
trans-unit.target: 當功能表項目會複製時，原始的功能表項目中指定的任何事件處理常式會繼續複製功能表項目的版本中運作。

trans-unit.source: For example, if you created a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem> and connected its <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem.Click> event to an event handler.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果您建立<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem>，且已連線其<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem.Click>事件之事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: When the menu item is cloned, the cloned menu item will call the same event handler.
trans-unit.target: 會複製功能表項目，複製的功能表項目會呼叫相同的事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: The following code example clones a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem> and displays it in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenu>.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例複製品<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem>並顯示在<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenu>。

trans-unit.source: The example requires that a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem> exists in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu> on a form with the name of `menuItem1` and that a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenu> object named `contextMenu1` also exists on the form.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例需要<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem>存在於<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu>表單上的名稱有`menuItem1`而且<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenu>名為物件`contextMenu1`表單上也有存在。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem" /> that represents the menu item to copy.
Creates a copy of the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem" />.
Call this method to create copies of menu items that you have already created for use in a shortcut menu or another menu structure within your application.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫此方法以建立您已經建立的捷徑功能表或其他功能表結構中使用應用程式中的功能表項目的複本。

trans-unit.source: This version of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem.CloneMenu%2A> allows you to specify a specific <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem> to copy instead of the menu item that is calling the method.
trans-unit.target: 這個版本的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem.CloneMenu%2A>可讓您指定特定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem>複製而不呼叫方法的功能表項目。

trans-unit.source: You can use this method to initialize a new <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem> object with a copy of another <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem>.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用這個方法來初始化新<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem>物件和另一份<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem>。

trans-unit.source: When a menu item is cloned, any event handlers specified in the original menu item will continue to function in the cloned version of the menu item.
trans-unit.target: 當功能表項目會複製時，原始的功能表項目中指定的任何事件處理常式會繼續複製功能表項目的版本中運作。

trans-unit.source: For example, if you created a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem> and connected its <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem.Click> event to an event handler.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果您建立<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem>，且已連線其<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem.Click>事件之事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: When the menu item is cloned, the cloned menu item will call the same event handler.
trans-unit.target: 會複製功能表項目，複製的功能表項目會呼叫相同的事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: The following code example initializes a new <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem> with a copy of an existing <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem> that is used in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu> on a form.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會初始化新<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem>的現有複本<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem>中都使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu>表單上。

trans-unit.source: The code then adds the cloned <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem> to a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenu> on the form.
trans-unit.target: 加入的程式碼再複製<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem>至<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenu>表單上。

trans-unit.source: This example requires that a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem> is already created and named `menuItem1` and that a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenu> control has been created and named `contextMenu1`.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例需要<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem>已經建立並命名`menuItem1`而且<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenu>控制已建立並命名`contextMenu1`。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the menu item is the default menu item.
<see langword="true" /> if the menu item is the default item in a menu; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 如果功能表項目功能表; 中的預設項目否則， <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default menu item for a menu is boldfaced.
trans-unit.target: 功能表的預設功能表項目為粗體。

trans-unit.source: When the user double-clicks a submenu that contains a default item, the default item is selected, and the submenu is closed.
trans-unit.target: 當使用者按兩下子功能表，其中包含預設項目、 預設項目已選取，而且關閉子功能表。

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem.DefaultItem%2A> property to indicate, the default action that is expected in a menu or shortcut menu.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem.DefaultItem%2A>屬性來表示，功能表或快速鍵功能表中預期要有預設動作。

trans-unit.source: The following code example creates a menu item with two submenu items.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會建立包含兩個子功能表項目的功能表項目。

trans-unit.source: The example sets `menuItem2` as the default menu item using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem.DefaultItem%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 範例會設定`menuItem2`做為預設功能表項目使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem.DefaultItem%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <see langword="false" /> to release only unmanaged resources.
Disposes of the resources (other than memory) used by the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem" />.
Call <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem.Dispose%2A> when you are finished using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem.Dispose%2A> 使用完畢時，請呼叫 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem.Dispose%2A> method leaves the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem> in an unusable state.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem.Dispose%2A> 方法會將 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem> 保留在無法使用的狀態。

trans-unit.source: After calling <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem.Dispose%2A>, you must release all references to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem> so the memory it was occupying can be reclaimed by garbage collection.
trans-unit.target: 在呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem.Dispose%2A>，您必須釋放所有參考<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem>讓它所佔用的記憶體可由記憶體回收收回。

trans-unit.source: Always call <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem.Dispose%2A> before you release your last reference to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem>.
trans-unit.target: 在您釋放最後一個 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem.Dispose%2A> 參考之前，請務必呼叫 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem>。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the resources the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem> is using will not be freed until garbage collection calls the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem> object's destructor.
trans-unit.target: 否則，資源<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem>是使用之前，將不會釋放記憶體回收集合呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem>物件的解構函式。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem.OwnerDraw" /> property of a menu item is set to <see langword="true" /> and a request is made to draw the menu item.

The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawItemEventArgs> argument passed to a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem.DrawItem> event handler provides a <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> object that enables you to perform drawing and other graphical operations on the surface of the menu item.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawItemEventArgs>引數傳遞給<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem.DrawItem>事件處理常式提供<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>物件，可讓您能夠執行繪圖以及其他圖形化介面上的作業的功能表項目。

trans-unit.source: You can use this event handler to create custom menus that meet the needs of your application.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用此事件處理常式來建立自訂的功能表，以符合您的應用程式的需求。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem.DrawItem> event.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何處理<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem.DrawItem>事件。

trans-unit.source: This example draws a menu item using a <xref:System.Drawing.Brush> and a <xref:System.Drawing.Font>, and then draws a <xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle> around the menu item.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例會繪製功能表項目使用<xref:System.Drawing.Brush>和<xref:System.Drawing.Font>，，然後繪製<xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle>功能表項目周圍。

trans-unit.source: The drawing is performed through the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> object, which is passed to the event handler in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawItemEventArgs> parameter.
trans-unit.target: 繪圖透過執行<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>物件，傳遞至事件處理常式中<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawItemEventArgs>參數。

trans-unit.source: This example requires that you have initialized the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem.OwnerDraw%2A> property for the item to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例需要您具有初始化<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem.OwnerDraw%2A>屬性之項目的`true`。

trans-unit.source: For the C# example, add the following code in the form's constructor, after `InitializeComponent`, to hook up the event:
trans-unit.target: C# 範例中，加上下列程式碼中表單的建構函式， `InitializeComponent`、 事件連結：

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the menu item is enabled.
<see langword="true" /> if the menu item is enabled; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 如果已啟用功能表項目。否則， <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem> that is disabled is displayed in a gray color to indicate its state.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem>也就是已停用，都會在灰色來指示其狀態。

trans-unit.source: When a parent menu item is disabled, all submenu items are not displayed.
trans-unit.target: 停用父功能表項目時，不會顯示所有的子功能表項目。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem.Popup> event to determine whether <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem> objects that provide support for cut, copy, and delete operations are enabled before the menu they are displayed in is shown.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem.Popup>事件，以判斷是否<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem>中顯示的功能表會顯示前，會啟用物件，提供支援進行剪下、 複製和刪除作業。

trans-unit.source: The example determines if `textBox1`, a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> control on the form, is enabled, has input focus, and has text selected before enabling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem> objects.
trans-unit.target: 此範例會判斷如果`textBox1`、<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>控制表單上、 已啟用，擁有輸入焦點，而且有啟用之前選取的文字<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem>物件。

trans-unit.source: This example requires that three <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem> objects are created named `menuCut`, `menuCopy`, and `menuDelete` have been created.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例需要該三<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem>物件會建立具名`menuCut`， `menuCopy`，和`menuDelete`已建立。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating the position of the menu item in its parent menu.
The zero-based index representing the position of the menu item in its parent menu.
trans-unit.target: 以零為起始的索引，表示功能表項目在父功能表中的位置。

trans-unit.source: This property provides the indexed position of a menu item in the menu item collection of its parent menu.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性會提供功能表項目的父功能表的功能表項目集合中的索引的位置。

trans-unit.source: You can use this property to reposition a menu item to a different location within its menu.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用這個屬性重新定位到其功能表中的不同位置的功能表項目。

trans-unit.source: You can also use this property when creating a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem> to specify its position in a menu structure at the time of creation.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以使用這個屬性，建立時<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem>在建立時指定其功能表結構中的位置。

trans-unit.source: The following code example switches the position of two menu items in a menu.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會切換功能表中的兩個功能表項目位置。

trans-unit.source: The following code example requires that two <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem> objects are created named `menuItem1` and `menuItem2`.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例需要有兩個<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem>物件會建立具名`menuItem1`和`menuItem2`。

trans-unit.source: The `menuItem1` menu item moves down one position in the menu, while `menuItem2` moves up one position.
trans-unit.target: `menuItem1`功能表項目下移一個位置，在功能表中，而`menuItem2`將向上移動一個位置。

trans-unit.source: The assigned value is less than zero or greater than the item count.
Gets a value indicating whether the menu item contains child menu items.
<see langword="true" /> if the menu item contains child menu items; <see langword="false" /> if the menu is a standalone menu item.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 如果功能表項目包含子功能表項目。<see langword="false" />如果是獨立的功能表項目。

trans-unit.source: You can use this property with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem.Parent%2A> property to navigate in code through an entire menu structure.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用這個屬性與<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem.Parent%2A>透過整個功能表結構的程式碼中巡覽的屬性。

trans-unit.source: The following code example determines whether there are any submenus associated with a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem> named `menuItem1`.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會判斷是否有任何相關聯的子功能表<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem>名為`menuItem1`。

trans-unit.source: If any submenus exist, it disables them by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem.Enabled%2A> property to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 如果存在任何的子功能表，則會停用它們藉由設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem.Enabled%2A>屬性`false`。

trans-unit.source: The example requires that there is a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem> created named `menuItem1`.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例需要有<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem>建立名為`menuItem1`。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the menu item will be populated with a list of the Multiple Document Interface (MDI) child windows that are displayed within the associated form.
<see langword="true" /> if a list of the MDI child windows is displayed in this menu item; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 如果 MDI 子視窗的清單會顯示在這個功能表項目。否則， <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: When a menu item is selected to display an MDI child window list, the list is displayed as a submenu of the menu item.
trans-unit.target: 若要顯示 MDI 子視窗清單選取功能表項目時，清單會顯示為子功能表的功能表項目。

trans-unit.source: Only forms that are defined as MDI child forms are displayed in the window list.
trans-unit.target: 定義為 MDI 子表單的表單會顯示在視窗清單。

trans-unit.source: Only nine child windows can be displayed at a time.
trans-unit.target: 只有九個子視窗可以顯示一次。

trans-unit.source: If there are more than nine child windows displayed, a "More Windows..." menu item is displayed at the end of the window list.
trans-unit.target: 如果沒有顯示九個以上的子視窗，「 多個 Windows … 」 的功能表項目會顯示在視窗清單的結尾。

trans-unit.source: Clicking this menu item displays a dialog box with a complete list of the child windows that are currently active.
trans-unit.target: 按一下這個功能表項目會顯示完整的清單包含目前使用中的子視窗的對話方塊。

trans-unit.source: The following code example creates a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem> that is used to display the list of currently open MDI child forms in an MDI form.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會建立<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem>用來在 MDI 表單中顯示目前開啟的 MDI 子表單的清單。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the menu needs to know the size of a menu item before drawing it.
In order for this event to be raised, you must have the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem.OwnerDraw%2A> property of the menu item set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 為了讓會引發這個事件，您必須擁有<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem.OwnerDraw%2A>功能表項目的屬性設定為`true`。

trans-unit.source: This event is raised before owner drawn menus are drawn to allow for the size of the menu item to be drawn to be specified.
trans-unit.target: 繪製主控描繪功能表允許指定要繪製功能表項目的大小之前，會引發這個事件。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of this member.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個成員。

trans-unit.source: In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem.MeasureItem> event.
trans-unit.target: 在範例中，事件處理常式會報告一次<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem.MeasureItem>事件。

trans-unit.source: This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging.
trans-unit.target: 此報表可協助您了解事件發生的時機，並可協助您偵錯。

trans-unit.source: To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem> named `MenuItem1`.
trans-unit.target: 若要執行範例程式碼，將它貼到包含類型的執行個體的專案<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem>名為`MenuItem1`。

trans-unit.source: Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem.MeasureItem> event.
trans-unit.target: 請確定事件處理常式關聯<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem.MeasureItem>事件。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating the Windows identifier for this menu item.
The Windows identifier for this menu item.
trans-unit.target: 這個功能表項目的 Windows 識別項。

trans-unit.source: Merges this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem" /> with another <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem" />.
Merges this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem" /> with another <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem" /> and returns the resulting merged <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem" />.
A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem" /> that represents the merged menu item.

When you call this version of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem.MergeMenu%2A>, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem> returned is a copy of the current menu item that can be merged with another menu item without affecting the functionality of the current item.
trans-unit.target: 當您呼叫這一版的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem.MergeMenu%2A>、<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem>傳回是一份目前功能表項目可合併與另一個功能表項目，而不會影響目前項目的功能。

trans-unit.source: This version of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem.MergeMenu%2A> method is similar to calling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem.CloneMenu%2A> method that contains no parameters.
trans-unit.target: 這個版本的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem.MergeMenu%2A>方法是類似於呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem.CloneMenu%2A>不含任何參數的方法。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem" /> that specifies the menu item to merge with this one.
Merges another menu item with this menu item.
Menu items are merged according to the value of the menu item's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem.MergeType%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem.MergeOrder%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 功能表項目會合併的功能表項目的值根據<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem.MergeType%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem.MergeOrder%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: This version of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem.MergeMenu%2A> method enables you to merge two <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem> objects (and their submenus) into a single menu.
trans-unit.target: 這個版本的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem.MergeMenu%2A>方法可讓您合併兩個<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem>物件 （和其子功能表） 於單一的功能表。

trans-unit.source: Menu merging is handled automatically when a Multiple Document Interface (MDI) parent form and a child both have menus.
trans-unit.target: 當多個文件介面 (MDI) 父表單和子功能表時，會自動處理功能表合併。

trans-unit.source: You can use this version of the method to merge two <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem> objects (and their submenu items) located in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu> control into a single menu within a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenu>.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用這個版本的方法來合併兩個<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem>物件 （和其子功能表項目） 位於<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu>控制項內的單一功能表插入<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenu>。

trans-unit.source: For example, you can call this version of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem.MergeMenu%2A> method to merge the menu items of a File and Edit menu into a single <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem> that can then be added to and displayed by a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenu>.
trans-unit.target: 例如，您可以呼叫這一版的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem.MergeMenu%2A>方法，將檔案和編輯功能表的功能表項目合併成單一<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem>，可以再加入並顯示由<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenu>。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses this version of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem.MergeMenu%2A> method to create a copy of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem> and merge it with another.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會使用這個版本的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem.MergeMenu%2A>方法來建立一份<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem>及合併與另一個。

trans-unit.source: The merged <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem> is then added to a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenu> control.
trans-unit.target: 合併<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem>接著會新增至<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenu>控制項。

trans-unit.source: This example requires that there are two menu items called `menuItem1` and `menuItem2` that contain submenu items within them and a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenu> named `contextMenu1` to display the menu items.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例需要有兩個功能表項目稱為`menuItem1`和`menuItem2`子功能表項目，其中包含與<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenu>名為`contextMenu1`顯示功能表項目。

trans-unit.source: `menuItem1` and `menuItem2` have different menu items contained within them.
trans-unit.target: `menuItem1` 和`menuItem2`有其內含不同的功能表項目。

trans-unit.source: After the call to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem.MergeMenu%2A> is made, a consolidated menu is created.
trans-unit.target: 在呼叫之後<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem.MergeMenu%2A>進行時，合併功能表的建立。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating the relative position of the menu item when it is merged with another.
A zero-based index representing the merge order position for this menu item.
trans-unit.target: 以零為起始的索引，表示這個功能表項目的合併順序位置。

trans-unit.source: The default is 0.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 0。

trans-unit.source: The merge order of a menu item specifies the relative position that this menu item will take if the menu structure that the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem> is contained in is merged with another.
trans-unit.target: 功能表項目的合併順序指定的相對位置，如果功能表結構，會採取這個功能表項目<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem>包含在與另一個合併。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem.MergeOrder%2A> property to control the way a merged menu is displayed.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem.MergeOrder%2A>屬性來控制合併的功能表顯示的方式。

trans-unit.source: This is a complete example, ready to run once you add it to your project.
trans-unit.target: 這是完整的範例，準備好要執行之後將它加入至您的專案。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating the behavior of this menu item when its menu is merged with another.
A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.MenuMerge" /> value that represents the menu item's merge type.
trans-unit.target: A<see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.MenuMerge" />值，表示功能表項目的合併類型。

trans-unit.source: The merge type of a menu item indicates how the menu item behaves when it has the same merge order as another menu item being merged.
trans-unit.target: 合併功能表項目型別表示功能表項目有另一個要合併的功能表項目的合併順序相同的行為。

trans-unit.source: You can use merged menus to create a consolidated menu based on two or more existing menus.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用合併的功能表，建立根據兩個或多個現有的功能表合併的功能表。

trans-unit.source: The following code example creates a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem> with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem.MergeType%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem.MergeOrder%2A> specified so that the menu item is added to the merged menu at first position.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會建立<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem>與<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem.MergeType%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem.MergeOrder%2A>指定功能表項目會加入至第一個位置的合併功能表。

trans-unit.source: The assigned value is not one of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.MenuMerge" /> values.
Gets a value indicating the mnemonic character that is associated with this menu item.
A character that represents the mnemonic character associated with this menu item.
trans-unit.target: 字元，表示與這個功能表項目相關的助憶鍵字元。

trans-unit.source: Returns the NUL character (ASCII value 0) if no mnemonic character is specified in the text of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果沒有助憶鍵字元指定的文字中傳回 NUL 字元 （ASCII 值 0） <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem" />。

trans-unit.source: The mnemonic character is the first character after an ampersand character (&) in the text of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem>.
trans-unit.target: 助憶鍵字元為第一個字元之後 & 符號字元 (&) 的文字中<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem>。

trans-unit.source: This property will not return a mnemonic if two ampersand characters are placed together as the ampersands are used to display an ampersand in the text of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem> instead of defining a mnemonic character.
trans-unit.target: 如果兩個連字號字元會放置在一起為連字號用來顯示的文字中的連字號，這個屬性不會傳回助憶鍵<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem>而不是定義助憶鍵字元。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
Raises the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem.Click" /> event.
Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: 引發事件會透過委派叫用此事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem.Click> event to perform tasks when a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem> is clicked.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem.Click>事件以執行工作時<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem>按下。

trans-unit.source: The example creates a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu> called `mainMenu1` and adds two <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem> objects, `topMenuItem` (`File`) and `menuItem1` (`Open`).
trans-unit.target: 此範例會建立<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu>呼叫`mainMenu1`及加入兩個<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem>物件`topMenuItem`(`File`) 和`menuItem1`(`Open`)。

trans-unit.source: It then connects the `Click` event to the `menuItem1_Click` event handler.
trans-unit.target: 然後連接`Click`事件`menuItem1_Click`事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: When the user clicks the `Open` menu item, an <xref:System.Windows.Forms.OpenFileDialog> is initialized and displayed.
trans-unit.target: 當使用者按一下`Open`功能表項目，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.OpenFileDialog>初始化，且會顯示。

trans-unit.source: The example requires that you have created a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> named `Form1`.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例需要您已建立<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>名為`Form1`。

trans-unit.source: When overriding <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem.OnClick(System.EventArgs)" /> in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem.OnClick(System.EventArgs)" /> method.
trans-unit.target: 在覆寫<see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem.OnClick(System.EventArgs)" />在衍生類別中，請務必呼叫基底類別的<see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem.OnClick(System.EventArgs)" />方法。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DrawItemEventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
Raises the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem.DrawItem" /> event.
Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: 引發事件會透過委派叫用此事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f)。

trans-unit.source: When overriding <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem.OnDrawItem(System.Windows.Forms.DrawItemEventArgs)" /> in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem.OnDrawItem(System.Windows.Forms.DrawItemEventArgs)" /> method.
trans-unit.target: 在覆寫<see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem.OnDrawItem(System.Windows.Forms.DrawItemEventArgs)" />在衍生類別中，請務必呼叫基底類別的<see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem.OnDrawItem(System.Windows.Forms.DrawItemEventArgs)" />方法。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
Raises the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem.Popup" /> event.
A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.MeasureItemEventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
Raises the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem.MeasureItem" /> event.
Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
